page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT FORRES WEST
page.content: The main land cover is commercial ,which is shops ,garages and private offices.People work about 40 hours a week and their average pay is Â£95 per week.There are over 57 shops in West Forres,mainly because of the RAF base at Kinloss {Unemployment: }15% of the population of Forres are unemployed.This is the highest rate of joblessness in the district and among the highest in Scotland.This is mainl;y because there are no factories etc. to create jobs. {Ardesier} Ther are many people living in Forres who work at Ardesier for an American company involved in rig construction for North Sea oil. {R.A.F.}Many of those at the RAF station at Kinloss live in Forres.They include technicians,air-traffic controllers,engineers,police, navigators,pilots etc.
